name: Lenovo 24 23.8" FHD All-in-One Desktop Computer for Home Office, Intel 4-Core Processor (Beat i3-1110G4), 32GB DDR4 RAM, 1TB PCIe SSD, WiFi 6, Bluetooth, Business AIO, Windows 11 Pro, Vent-Hear
short_description: The Lenovo 24 All-In-One Desktop PC features an Intel Intel Processor N100 (Total Cores 4, Total Threads 4, 6M Cache, Max Turbo Frequency 3.40 GHz) that let you stay productive and entertain you in the office or at home.

23.8" FHD (1920x1080) IPS Anti-glare 250nits, 99% sRGB, Non-touch Display. This Lenovo All-in-One desktop computer can fit into many different environments with ease, and ideal for school, university, business, studio, and workplace settings.
Optimized Memory & Storage: 32GB DDR4 RAM and 1TB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD for seamless multitasking and ample storage, provides fast bootup and reliable storage for your files, documents, and multimedia.

Wireless & Ports: Wi-Fi 6, 802.11ax 2x2 and Bluetooth 5.2 ensure reliable connectivity, plus an array of ports, including 2x USB-A (Hi-Speed USB / USB 2.0), 2x USB-A (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), 1x HDMI -out 1.4b, 1x Ethernet (RJ-45), 1x headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm) for ultimate flexibility.

Operating system: Windows 11 Professional English (64-bit). Designed for school, work, and entertainment, this Lenovo All-in-One desktop computer for home office ensures smooth multitasking and efficient operation, tackle your busiest days and save everything you love. USB Calliope Wired Keyboard, Black, English (US) and EOS Mouse, Cloud Grey; Cloud Grey. Bundled with vent-hear Cable.

product_description: The HP 24-inch All-in-One Desktop takes caring for the planet to the next level. This contemporary, ultra-slim desktop was designed with the planet in mind, while turning your to-do lists into to-done lists with the reliable processing power of the Intel Core i5-1334U, upgraded memory, and enhanced multitasking features for heightened performance. Plus, this HP desktop is EPEAT Gold registered and ENERGY STAR certified. This HP computer comes with an HP white wired keyboard, HP white wired mouse, 90 W Smart AC power adapter, setup instructions, and 3 free months of PC Game Pass. HP is here to help. This HP computer comes with 1-year limited hardware warranty and 90-days limited technical support for software and initial setup.

name: Lenovo IdeaCentre AIO 3i - All in One Desktop - PC Computer - Mouse & Keyboard Included - 21.5" FHD Display - Windows 11-8GB Memory - 256GB Storage - Intel Core i3-1215U
short_description: BUILT FOR HEAVY USE: Engineered to handle heavy workloads and relentless multitasking thanks to the powerful 12th generation Intel Core i3 processor
STORAGE FOR ALL YOUR FILES: Store thousands of your family's favorite songs, images, movies, and shows with the AIO 3i's expansive storage capacity
KEEP IN TOUCH: Clear video quality from the HD 720p camera and excellent audio pickup from the dual array microphone keep family video chats and vlog recordings running smoothly
MADE FOR FAMILY TIME: Experience crystal clear video quality from wide viewing angles when streaming your family's favorite movie or shows
SEE MORE OF THE SCREEN: The borderless display makes every inch of your 21.5-inch anti-glare screen count when watching entertainment or working on visual projects
EXPERIENCE CLEAR AND CRISP AUDIO: With the two built-in 3W speakers, fill the room with music from your favorite Spotify playlist
SMOOTH AND SPEEDY UNDER PRESSURE: Keep your productivity smooth and uninterrupted with Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1
CLEAR THE CLUTTER: Free up desk space by keeping your cables confined to the integrated clip and place your smartphone on the built-in phone holder dock, so you never miss a notification
MORE CONNECTIVITY OPTIONS: The IdeaCentre AIO 3i packs more than enough ports, including USB 2.0, USB 3.2 Gen 2, HDMI 1.4, Ethernet (RJ-45), and a power connector
EVERYTHING YOU NEED: This IdeaCentre All in One Desktop computer set comes with a wireless keyboard and wireless mouse
product_description: As a family PC that everyone will feel comfortable using, the Lenovo IdeaCentre AIO 3i seamlessly handles multitasking from last minute school assignments to critical work projects with 12th Generation Intel Core i3 processing power. The compact, space-saving design packs in a vivid 22-inch FHD display and high-quality speakers. Included wireless accessories and cord management keeps your desk clear of clutter.
